pageContext.claim: “Every decision we make -- on taxes, trade, regulation, energy, immigration, education, and more -- is focused on improving the lives of everyday Americans. We are determined to create the highest standard of living that anyone can imagine. … We're determined to ensure that the working and middle class reap the largest gains.”
pageContext.analysis: No matter how you slice it, the super wealthy did rather well under Trump's 2017 tax bill. Not only did they benefit from a reduction in tax rates, but there are numerous other provisions that benefits the wealthy, including repeal of the alternative minimum tax and lower rate for pass-through entities. The top one percent end up with about 47 percent of the tax cuts, according to the Tax Policy Center.
